index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Licensing and regulation of Cabulances and amending Sections 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 11, 12, 15, 18, 19, 20, and 21 of Ordinance 93789 to transfer certain functions of the City Council and City Comptroller to the Director of Licenses and Consumer Affairs.
